author: Sophie Dahl
method: Pour all the ingredients, except for the lime wedges, into a cocktail shaker and shake well to mix.  Strain into a tall glass over ice cubes and garnish with lime wedges.
ingredients: 40ml/1½fl oz vodka,  75ml/3fl oz tomato juice,  dash lemon juice,  ½ tsp Worcestershire sauce,  2-3 drops Tabasco sauce,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  handful ice cubes,  lime wedges, to serve
